mapper.select: SELECT a.exercise_feedback_request_no as exerciseFeedbackRequestNo, a.food_info_no as foodInfoNo, a.ingestion_amount as ingestionAmount, a.food_feedback_date as foodFeedbackDate, b.food_name as foodName, b.food_group as foodGroup FROM food_feedback a INNER JOIN food b ON a.food_info_no = b.food_no WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo} ORDER BY food_feedback_date DESC

SELECT a.exercise_feedback_request_no as exerciseFeedbackRequestNo, a.exercise_no as exerciseNo, a.exercise_time as exerciseTime, a.exercise_feedback_date as exerciseFeedbackDate, b.exercise_name as exerciseName, b.exercise_calorie as exerciseCalorie FROM exercise_feedback a INNER JOIN exercise b ON a.exercise_no = b.exercise_no WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo} ORDER BY exercise_feedback_date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM food_feedback WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM exercise_feedback WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo}

SELECT a.teacher_no as memberNo, c.member_id as memberId, c.member_name as memberName, b.evaluation_average_grade as evaluationAverageGrade FROM exercise_feedback_request a INNER JOIN member_teacher b ON a.teacher_no = b.member_no INNER JOIN member c ON a.teacher_no = c.member_no WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo}

SELECT AVG(a.exercise_feedback_evaluation_grade) as exerciseFeedbackEvaluationGrade FROM exercise_feedback_evaluation a INNER JOIN exercise_feedback_request b ON a.exercise_feedback_request_no = b.exercise_feedback_request_no INNER JOIN member c ON b.teacher_no = c.member_no WHERE teacher_no = #{teacherNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise_feedback_evaluation (exercise_feedback_request_no, exercise_feedback_evaluation_grade, exercise_feedback_evaluation_date) VALUES ( #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo}, #{exerciseFeedbackEvaluationGrade}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT exercise_feedback_evaluation_grade as exerciseFeedbackEvaluationGrade, exercise_feedback_evaluation_date as exerciseFeedbackEvaluationDate FROM exercise_feedback_evaluation WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo}

SELECT a.exercise_feedback_request_no as exerciseFeedbackRequestNo, a.exercise_feedback_title as exerciseFeedbackTitle, a.exercise_feedback_content as exerciseFeedbackContent, a.exerciser_feedback_result_date as exerciseFeedbackResultDate, c.member_id as memberId, c.member_name as memberName, b.teacher_no as teacherNo FROM exercise_feedback_request_result a INNER JOIN exercise_feedback_request b ON a.exercise_feedback_request_no = b.exercise_feedback_request_no INNER JOIN member c ON b.teacher_no = c.member_no WHERE a.exercise_feedback_request_no = #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM exercise_feedback_request_result WHERE exercise_feedback_request_no > #{exerciseFeedbackRequestNo} ORDER BY exercise_feedback_request_no ASC LIMIT 1
